nodes.title: 06/21/2023 Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
nodes.body:
Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
Wednesday, 21 June 2023 from 22:00-23:00 EST (02:00-03:00 UTC) 

**Agenda:** 

Membership and Board Election Updates

SIGGRAPH Outreach

Privacy, Cybersecurity & Identity (PCI) Charter Approval 

Exploratory Group Proposals
- Industrial Metaverse
- Accessibility
- Ethical Principles

Domain Group Processes and Templates
- Domain Group Deliverables
- Subgroup Process
- Domain Group Coordination
- Additional agenda items requests welcome!





**--> [Google slides]TO COME<--**

**--> [Slides as PDF] TO COME<--**

nodes.title: 05/24/2023 Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
nodes.body:
Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
Wednesday, 24 May 2023 from 21:00-22:30 EST (01:00-02:30 UTC) 

**Agenda:** 

- Membership transition update
- Board of Directors update and upcoming elections
- Industrial Metaverse and the Forum (Nokia)
- Outreach update and upcoming opportunities
- Exploratory Group Brainstorming
- Domain Subgroup process discussion
- Domain Group Coordination discussion
- GLTF physics



**--> [Google slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Q7VWXU5STfapOIP84xYjVRM-k6kLlGPmLiwtEexCbSM/edit#slide=id.g249c355abd5_2_0)<--**

**--> [Slides as PDF](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/files/11560342/Metaverse.Standards.Forum.Oversight.17.24May23.pdf)<--**


![Slide4](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/d9793c3f-6d9a-47c6-87fc-374a624570af)

Membership transition period has started. 
- Six-month transition period for all members to execute updated membership agreement
- All Members are encouraged to execute the new online agreements ASAP:
--  Very similar legal obligations to initial agreements
-- https://metaverse-standards.org/members/  

Deadlines to note:
- Sign the new membership agreement by **October 2023**
- HOWEVER, if we want to nominate someone from our community to the MSF board, then we need to sign the new membership agreement asap and complete the nomination form by **June 24, 2023** (see slide below on board election)


![Slide5](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/075511cf-185f-4e9a-be5b-4310dfa2c383)


![Slide6](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/0fa68b17-d3ca-4283-8892-d5fa3a5400ae)


![Slide7](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/91dec71f-58ec-4a9c-8658-ad4c0272087a)


![Slide8](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/8827c852-69a3-4e83-bfac-f9dc7b81a8ae)


**Board nomination info:**
![Slide9](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/2d0c22be-8ae6-402e-b5fe-36bccd5892a7)

![Slide10](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/6e182d88-991a-4baf-b54f-d1348b809183)


Nokia gave a presentation that focused on the *industrial* metaverse:
- [Slide deck](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/files/11560388/Nokia.presentation.to.MSF.oversight.on.industrial.metaverse.May.2023.FINAL.pdf)
- [Recording of Nokia's presentation](https://tools.metaverse-standards.org/documents/f/9404)

(No decisions or actions steps needed; just something to be aware of i.e., growth of industrial focus and how MSF can be involved)

The detailed roadmap is very interesting (slide 7):

![roadmap_Nokia_MetaverseDeployment](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/assets/34685781/b6414e5c-e5b4-47be-b01f-70300daf4eed)

I (@funksoup) asked to add an item to the agenda concerning GLTF physics (via @aaronfranke) as described in this [GLTF Physics Standard page](https://github.com/omigroup/omigroup/discussions/393). (Special thanks to [IndieBio](https://twitter.com/indiebio) for the table creation).

We displayed the table and talked through differences between the two competing standards, highlighting details such as the differences between body category and materials definition. We got a great response from the MSF audience at the meeting, and we were encouraged to ping the larger email list to get more feedback.

**(Short link to the page, for easier sharing: https://bit.ly/gltfstandard)**

nodes.title: 04/19/23 Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
nodes.body:
Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
Wednesday, 19 April 2023 from 21:00-22:30 EST (01:00-02:30 UTC) 

**Agenda:** 

Incorporation rollout update
- Announcement and online materials
- New signup form
- Board update
- Coverage 

Domain Group Updates
- 3D Web Exploratory Group first meeting this Thursday
- Register Working Group update
- Approval of Network Requirements and Capabilities Exploratory Group [Charter](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1u9SFR0jc0GbSwf4NJ0T7kJA-2J7oyXf6L6Ly6Z7q4E8/edit)
- Discussion on Academia and Research Exploratory Group [Proposal](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16uShuCiu1kz-m51b41Itp3oWpvsGLkIIyYpZ0nYukJg/edit?usp=sharing) 
- Exploratory Group Proposal pipeline
- Working Group action template

Forum outreach update
- And New Member Orientation Meetings

**--> [Google slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1DjxbgARcqEEKTWDj1Ig3bhFY8-wJwN_EpL9DY5DiBCw/edit#slide=id.g232a61dc2dd_2_85)<--**

**--> [Slides as PDF](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/files/11278750/Metaverse.Standards.Forum.Oversight.16.19Apr23.pdf)--**


I (@funksoup) asked to add an item to the agenda concerning interoperability -- competing standards between OMI's [OMI_collider](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_collider) and [OMI_physics_body](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_physics_body) glTF extensions and Microsoft's physics https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2257  (via @aaronfranke)

-- Issue is described in detail in this [OMI_collider and OMI_physics_body pull request](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2258) and there's a bulleted list of specific differences and impacts. 


![Slide04](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/233235670-a9fc6092-0ea3-41d2-994b-6e9ebdae7319.jpeg)

nodes.title: 04/12/23 Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
nodes.body:
Metaverse Standards Forum: Oversight
Wednesday, 12 April 2023 from 21:00-22:30 EST (01:00-02:30 UTC) 

The Forum is now an independent non-profit industry consortium!
- Why and how we incorporated
- Public announcement on Tuesday April 18th 
- What it means to your membership

Outreach update
- Get involved in promoting the Forum (and your organization!)

Domain Pipeline updates
- Initiate, discover and engage with Exploratory and Working Groups that are relevant to your organization

New Member Orientations
- Find your way around the Forum and its resources

**--> [Google slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hWgWIlhsSxL2-0buPLEC_Ddqvg93LXc_S8uFzjkhQBc/edit#slide=id.g22d7ba5e7cc_2_29)<--**

**--> [Slides as PDF](https://github.com/omigroup/MSF-Delegates/files/11217257/Metaverse.Standards.Forum.Plenary.7.APC.12Apr23.pdf)<--**

The Forum is now incorporated as an independent non-profit industry consortium!

![Slide11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231620845-95ef5940-15a8-4a3a-8aa1-cf3096317326.jpeg)


![Slide12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231620868-3c2314fc-d5d1-4702-9cc6-4772179914f2.jpeg)


Dues structure and amounts have been based on user surveys done the past couple of months within the MSF community. (OMI had a big role in advocating for the inclusion of language that allows for smaller orgs, nonprofits, open source communities and individuals to join):
![Slide13](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231620870-d6559ce6-2b93-4931-bdf1-b5bcf45e156d.jpeg)

**Public Launch of the Forum Incorporation on April 18 at 6 AM PT** - everyone is welcome to share on their socials
Draft [press release ](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZNQPuIvD_byupGoe0EYX7kXXBLjR8ED4/edit)and [press briefing deck ](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/13ecaJcOZsjUntoDLHcsQwDNqpmUNnz9AXPbXPLjkQ_M/edit#slide=id.g22c84a7b14d_2_68)


![Slide17](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231626404-e316435d-48ce-45d3-bacc-426e42e62725.jpeg)


**Twitter card for social sharing:**

![Twitter Card for Forum Members - Incorporation Public Announcement](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231630248-de61b8eb-4767-4e6c-9cb5-0fea0c04186f.jpg)

![Slide18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627894-aafa7af5-9b19-4a1b-aabe-18bb79ef0f13.jpeg)


![Slide19](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627895-023b4fc2-4a9e-411a-bcbd-9594c7951db5.jpeg)


![Slide20](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627899-fc93f39e-cc47-4dc2-996a-b01e337df193.jpeg)


![Slide21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627900-bc6f26bf-c18b-4d6b-ad9f-5f643256a1e5.jpeg)


![Slide22](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627901-bd348306-0b9a-4fba-81c4-98d11d34002f.jpeg)


![Slide23](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627903-4f6ea064-2d37-4d5a-96cd-2f335070b909.jpeg)


![Slide24](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627904-d45f06cb-f80f-4e42-b53e-edbfc1744fbd.jpeg)

They are looking for a speaker to represent MSF at this virtual conference:

![Slide25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627906-d73910d6-13ce-4e1d-8afa-2ae85817afc0.jpeg)


![Slide26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627909-c300e679-13af-4ee2-a5cb-37d63b531cc3.jpeg)


![Slide27](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627910-75c9476c-5c10-459b-8b4c-14d8f16529e7.jpeg)


![Slide28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627911-555fc2b0-0f50-425d-8ffd-21719a25a67b.jpeg)


![Slide29](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627912-71f2191a-0394-4d53-8b25-2c935963bcb6.jpeg)


![Slide30](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34685781/231627913-2ef78896-96ba-405c-bb1f-5caef8c2239b.jpeg)
